premise_source_doc_sentence: Denzel Hayes Washington Jr.  (  born December 28 , 1954  )  is an American actor , director , and producer .

claim: Denzel Washington lost an award for his role in Glory.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He has received three Golden Globe awards , a Tony Award , and two Academy Awards : Best Supporting Actor for the historical war drama film Glory  (  1989  )  and Best Actor for his role as a corrupt cop in the crime thriller Training Day  (  2001  )  .

claim: Denzel Washington lost an award for his role in Glory.

premise_source_doc_sentence: Glory was nominated for five Academy Awards and won three , including one for Denzel Washington for Best Supporting Actor for his portrayal of Private Silas Tripp .
